name: XXZ: Strip Club
summary: Zombie Apocalypses turned out to be somewhat different from what science fiction authors used to write. Only women can turn into zombies. Day Z caught you in one of the biggest strip clubs in Las Vegas. You are gathering a group of three people in order to escape the city.

name: XXX, I Want You to Keep Fighting
summary: A highly flexible semi-automatic idle game where you can intervene in battles and character development to have a huge boost up. Also, through conversations between the protagonists, you'll hear a story steeped in the past, narrating the origins of them.

name: XX Fulfillment Center
summary: You've been hired as a Part-Time Contract Packaging Worker at the fulfillment center. Can you find your own happiness amid the speeding conveyor belts and ever-growing list of rules?

name: XXL Woofia
summary:
Power! Laughter! Energy!

Welcome to WOOFIA, a land where humans, Beastfolks, and Hominians of all kinds thrive in vibrant harmony.

From vast grasslands to an ever-buzzing city that never sleeps, to primal volcanic islands, dazzling futuristic metropolises, and of course, a gym brimming with raw masculinity...

Join our protagonist, Ying Hugeeu, in this diverse world as he embarks on an adventurous journey, meeting all kinds of unique men and igniting fiery passions along the way!

name: XXX Puzzle
summary: XXX Puzzle is an interpretation of the game 15 Puzzle. It is straightforward and yet captivating, designed for true lovers of intellectual games.

name: Xxx_Cyberrat_Xxx
summary: An infamous cybercriminal and owner of a luxurious underground marketplace tries to reclaim his position in the distrustful society of blackhat hackers and druglords. You must utilize your hacking and intelligence gathering skills in a race with your worsening mental state and sudden hallucinations.

name: XXOO
summary: A puzzle game for playdate console

name: XXX Puzzle: Expansion Pack 3
summary: 10 new levels to XXX Puzzle. New game mode. The total playing time is 2 hours.

name: XXX Puzzle: Expansion Pack 1
summary: 10 new levels to XXX Puzzle. The total playing time is 2 hours.

name: X+X the game
summary: A simple, handdrawn blasting title from _elektroform.pl

name: XX Delicto
summary: Velocity battles to save her princess in XX Delicto, a voluptuous post-apocalyptic whack-n-slash.

name: XXZ: XXL - Dead Souls Trial
summary: A married couple is going to fight against pretty Zombie girls. New game mechanics in the already-discovered XXZ world.

name: Xxxy
summary: Spawn humans, increase their stats, produce food, spawn faster

name: XXX Puzzle: Expansion Pack 4
summary: 10 new levels to XXX Puzzle.

name: XXZ 2
summary: Having escaped from the “Death Island”, a group of the survived people resumes their struggle for life. Your mission is to reach the military base where you hope to be safe.

name: XXZ: XXL - Rush
summary: A nurse and a security officer working at the hospital are trying to escape from the city invaded by Zombie girls. New game mechanics in the already-discovered XXZ world.

name: XXX Puzzle: Expansion Pack 2
summary: 10 new levels to XXX Puzzle. New game mode. The total playing time is 2 hours.

name: XXZ: XXL - Squad Trial
summary: A squad of military officers from the secret base is trying to get access to the air field.

name: xXx
summary: You are underground thrill-seeker turned spy Xander Cage. Can you stop the evil Anarchy 99 organizaton before it unleashes an assault on Earth? Tackle a variety of pulse-pounding, action-packed levels. Face 11 menacing missions, featuring 3 motorcycle tracks. Master an array of high-tech secret agent weapons

name: XXZ: XXL
summary: Zombie Apocalypses turned out to be somewhat different from what science fiction authors used to write. Only women can turn into zombies. Day Z caught you in one of the biggest strip clubs in Las Vegas. You are gathering a group of three people in order to escape the city.

name: XXZ: XXL - Squad
summary: A squad of military officers from the secret base is trying to get access to the air field.

name: XXZ
summary: Zombie Apocalypses turned out to be somewhat different from what science fiction authors used to write. Only women can turn into zombies. You are spending your holidays on a tropical island when Day Z comes. Your mission is to lead a group of three people who try to escape to the boat.

name: XxxHolic: Watanuki no Izayoi Sowa
summary: The protagonist of the series is Kimihiro Watanuki, a high school student who is constantly haunted by monsters, ghosts and spirits who are magically attracted to him because of his blood. These monsters are invisible to people without power, so other people brand him as weird or crazy when he is haunted by the spirits. Everything changes when he goes into a store that sells wishes.

name: XXZ: XXL - Dead Souls
summary: A married couple is going to fight against pretty Zombie girls. New game mechanics in the already-discovered XXZ world.

name: XXX
summary: A visit to a brothel with "recreational" areas
